telegram.question: How does it work through Telegram?
telegram.answer: Simply add our Synoro bot to your Telegram and start chatting. Send text messages or voice notes about your tasks, expenses, or maintenance activities. Our AI will automatically understand and categorize everything for you.

voice.question: Can I use voice messages?
voice.answer: Yes! Voice messages are fully supported. Simply record a voice note in Telegram describing what you did, bought, or need to remember. Our system will transcribe and process your voice message automatically.

security.question: Is my data secure?
security.answer: Absolutely. We use professional security to protect your data. Your information is stored safely and never shared with other companies. You have full control over your data and can export or delete it at any time.

family.question: How does family sharing work?
family.answer: With the Family plan, multiple family members can log activities to the same account. Each person gets their own Telegram bot access, and you can see combined reports for the entire household.

Hero.title: Your Personal Home Assistant
Hero.subtitle: Make your daily life easier with smart task management. Record your activities by voice or text, get helpful tips, and organize your time better than ever.

Features.title: Key Features
Features.subtitle: Discover the helpful features that make Synoro the best assistant for your everyday life.

smartLogging.title: Easy Task Recording
smartLogging.description: Record your tasks and events using voice or text messages. The system automatically organizes everything for you.

aiInsights.title: Smart Processing
aiInsights.description: The system automatically understands and organizes your entries into the right categories.

analytics.title: Reports & Statistics
analytics.description: Get detailed reports and visual charts of your activities with future predictions.

reminders.title: Smart Reminders
reminders.description: Get timely notifications based on your habits and schedule patterns.

productivity.title: Game-like Experience
productivity.description: Turn your daily tasks into an enjoyable game with points and rewards.

security.title: Safe & Private
security.description: Professional security keeps your personal information safe and private.

Pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the right plan to boost your productivity and make life easier.

Footer.description: Your smart assistant for better task management and easier daily life.
Footer.newsletterDescription: Get the latest updates and helpful tips sent to your email.

HowItWorks.title: Simple. Smart. Efficient.
HowItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to improve your productivity and learn more about your daily activities.

step1.title: 1. Tell Us What You Did
step1.description: Simply tell Synoro what you've done. Use voice messages or text - the system understands everyday language perfectly.

step2.title: 2. System Organizes
step2.description: The smart system sorts your activities by category, adds timestamps, and finds helpful patterns in your daily routine.

step3.title: 3. Get Helpful Tips
step3.description: Receive personal reports, time-saving suggestions, and smart recommendations to improve your daily life.

WhoBenefits.subtitle: See how Synoro makes daily life easier for different people with personalized solutions and helpful insights.
